examples.example: 从我家到公司大约有五公里的路程，但我每天都很享受这段通勤。

translate.english: It is about five kilometers from my home to the company, but I enjoy this commute every day.

examples.example: 这次的马拉松比赛全程四十多公里，选手们都全力以赴地挑战自我。

translate.english: This marathon race is more than forty kilometers in total, and the runners all go all out to challenge themselves.

examples.example: 为了保持健康，我每天都会跑几公里。

translate.english: In order to keep healthy, I will run several kilometers every day.
